casebody.data:
MOORESVILLE HOSP.
v.
NCDHHS. No. 404A03-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 15, 2005. Noah H. Huffstetler, III, Wallace C. Hollowell, III, Raleigh, Denise M. Gunter, Winston-Salem, for The Presbyterian Hospital and Town of Huntersville. James A. Wellons, Melissa L. Trippe, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, for NCDHHS, Fitzgerald, Hoffman. Maureen Demarest Murray, Greensboro, John C. Fennebresque, C. Ralph Kinsey, Jr., Charlotte, for Mooresville Hospital Mgmt.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th day of September 2005 by Petitioner (Mooresville Hospital Management Associates, Inc.) for Extension of Time to File Reply Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 15th day of September 2005."
